name: logseq-cleanup-orphans
description: Automatically remove orphaned pages from Logseq with a keyboard shortcut and toolbar button
author: Geir Sagberg

scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch -m "chore: bump version to %s"
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor -m "chore: bump version to %s"
scripts.bump:major: npm version major -m "chore: bump version to %s"
